## BaseConfig.enableAbort property

abort fetch, enable by given true or number(means timeout)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enableAbort?: boolean | number;
```

## Remarks

[MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AbortController)

not supported in dynamic config
